original_title: That the World May Know, Volume 11: Into the Desert to be Tested
overview: Although the Israelites often chose chaos over shalom during their forty years of testing in the desert, God continued to teach and shape them. A new generation emerged from the desert as a people who obeyed and trusted God with all their heart, soul and strength.
title: That the World May Know, Volume 11: Into the Desert to be Tested
